page.title: 01Survey of Kirk Bramwith.
page.content: The parish of Kirk Bramwith is 7miles N.E.of Doncaster, population 260 and includes Braithwaite,Kirkhouse Green, and South Bramwith.A farming community but becoming a commuting area for Doncaster.The area is crossed by two canals and the river Don.Numerous drainage dykes prevent the land flooding these empty into river via pumping station.The soil is clay with alluvial deposits sub soil sand and clay.There is a parish church but nearest schools shops and amenities are in Barnby Dun or Stainforth,daily deliveries of mail,newspapers and milk a limited bus service,railway station Doncaster.Principal landowners:_ A.Pashley & sons,W & V Fox, A. Mawson, N.Smith,G.Duckitt,F.Shaw,D.Sleath, J.Firth,S.Moore,G.Scott.
